page.title: 02STANTON BY DALE.
page.content:
THE{CHURCH}AT STANTON-BY-DALE HAS
A TOWER AND ON THE NORTH SIDE THERE ARE THREE STONE CROSSES BUILT INTO THE WALL. ON THE WEST SIDE THERE IS A SPIRTUAL CROSS WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1872. THE OLDEST GRAVESTONE IN THE YARD IS FROM 1806. THE CHURCH ITSELF IS CALLED SAINT MICHAELS AND ALL ANGELS PARISH CHURCH,FROM THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND. THE PORCH OF THE CHURCH IS VERY OLD AS IT IS WEATHER BEATEN. ABOVE THE CHURCH THERE IS A SUN DIAL MADE FROM SAND STONE AND IT IS ABOUT THIRTY CENTIMETRES IN DIAMETER, BUT THE DIAL DOES NOT WORK BECAUSE IT IS IN THE SHADE.
